thread.title: Cory Bernardi offers half-hearted criticism of Ross Cameron's comments
thread.title_full: Cory Bernardi offers half-hearted criticism of Ross Cameron's comments

title: Cory Bernardi offers half-hearted criticism of Ross Cameron's comments
text:
Cory Bernardi dinner disrupted by ... Cory Bernardi dinner disrupted by protestors 
More than a hundred anti-racism protesters clashed with people heading to a secret fundraising dinner in Melbourne for the anti-Islam organisation Q Society. More videos Ross Cameron delivers half-hearted apology 
Liberal Party member and Sky News presenter Ross Cameron has issued an apology of sorts for the remarks he made about homosexuals at a conservative fundraiser. Vision: SKY NEWS . 
Mr Cameron also spoke at Thursday night's Q Society event where he referred to The Sydney Morning Herald as the "Sydney Morning Homosexual" and claimed the NSW division of the Liberal Party was one big "gay club". 
Senator Bernardi said on Sunday he had spoken with Mr Cameron after the event who explained to him the "historical context" of his comments. SHARE
